pullrequest.title: Replace joint frame references with Jc and Jp

content.raw:
I think now we have the new figure we should only use that one. The old figure adds confusion IMO and it creates a lot of additional space.  
Maybe say something like: “The following SDF model demonstrates the specification of a revolute joint, with frames P, C, Jp and Jc as illustrated in <reference to the new figure>”
content.html:
I think now we have the new figure we should only use that one. The old figure adds confusion IMO and it creates a lot of additional space.
Maybe say something like: “The following SDF model demonstrates the specification of a revolute joint, with frames P, C, Jp and Jc as illustrated in <reference to the new figure>”
